A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Aside from a collection of visually engaging scenes\, the movie offers little to recommend.  From character and plot development/stewardship\, to dialogue and acting\, this thing is a careless abomination.  And the ham-handed political messages are as poorly executed as they are inappropriate.  Dern's \"strong female leader\" shtick was actually more cringingly uncomfortable to watch than Anakin wooing Padme.  Bleh.  Done with SW.... and (to whatever extents possible) done with Disney.
